name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.maps
description:
The default number of map tasks per job.
  Ignored when mapreduce.framework.name is "local".

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.shuffle.log.limit.kb
description:
Maximum size of the syslog.shuffle file in kilobytes
    (0 for no limit).

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.

name: ha.failover-controller.active-standby-elector.zk.op.retries
description: The number of zookeeper operation retry times in ActiveStandbyElector

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
description:
The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting
  files, in megabytes.  By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which
  should minimize seeks.

name: dfs.blockreport.incremental.intervalMsec
description:
If set to a positive integer, the value in ms to wait between sending
    incremental block reports from the Datanode to the Namenode.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.retry-interval
description:
The delay between getJob retries in ms for retries configured
  with yarn.app.mapreduce.client.job.max-retries.
